a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption from fossil fuels, nuclear and renewables,
The breakdown of primary energy is shown based on the ‘substitution’ method which takes account of inefficiencies in
Data source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
Note: Renewables includes hydropower, solar, wind, geothermal, wave and tidal and bioenergy. It does not include traditional biofuels.
